sources.title: Depth Charge | FULL MOVIE | 2008 | Action, Thriller | Eric Roberts
sources.description:
On his final voyage a commandeer aboard a nuclear submarine is making a shocking bid for world peace. With the help of mercenaries he takes over the sub in order to hold Washington D.C. and the world hostage.
The captain of a nuclear-powered submarine turns on his own country when he holds the sub and Washington DC hostage. The ransom: the resignation of the President.

Eric Roberts, Jason Gedrick, Chris Warren Jr., David Dayan Fisher, Maury Sterling, Deobia Oparei
2008
Directed by Terrence O'Hara

Edited for YouTube ad standards

metadata.Plot: On his final voyage before being transferred to a desk job, Commander Krieg, a seasoned Naval officer aboard the nuclear submarine USS Montana and overlooked for promotion to captain is making a shocking bid for world peace. With the help of mercenaries,he takes over the sub, its nuclear weapons and experimental stealth technology in order to hold Washington D.C. and the world hostage.
metadata.Actors: Jason Gedrick, Eric Roberts, Barry Bostwick
